alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:20PM EDT until July 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Southern Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Williamston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Williamston, Stokes, House, Pactolus, Bruce, East Carolina University, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, Jamesville, Smithwick, Everetts, Dardens and Beargrass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
